title: Bought a skin without reciving it
body: Hi i bought a Akali skin without reciving it, but the RP was taken .. when i check my purchase history it dosn't even say i bought something`?`anyone know what do do? Thx

replies.body: I've gone ahead and checked out your account, but I'm not 100% sure which skin you were trying to buy. I can see where you recently bought Akali earlier today, but I'm not seeing a skin purchase attempt. Let me know which one you were trying to buy, or if this was done on a different account.
